"Facebook posts
stated on April 23, 2022 in social media posts:
Videos show that Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy uses cocaine.

Viral videos falsely claiming Ukraine’s Zelenskyy uses cocaine are altered

IF YOUR TIME IS SHORT
